name: Sabyan
description:
In the lands of Sabyan, take the part of our hero, and face legion and legion of robots, machines that once get mad exterminated humans, will you be brave enough to join the resistance?

DEVELOPED BY: 

DUMBERMORE (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2017/2018)

GAME DESIGN:
Barbara Sciortino
Antonio Vazzana

PROGRAMMING:
Diego Cugno
Alfredo Matteucci
Pietro Paolo Russo

3D ART:
Davide Arena
Manuel Zavaglia
Vincenzo Grillo

CONCEPT ART:
Veronica Rubba
